tasks.question: If I'm migrating a FastAPI app from 0.99 to 0.100, and I have a model with orm_mode=True and a @validator decorator, what two changes do I need to make?
tasks.answer_v1: No changes needed - orm_mode=True and @validator work correctly
tasks.answer_v2: Change orm_mode=True to from_attributes=True in model_config, and change @validator to @field_validator
tasks.evidence_v1: [FastAPI 0.99] Uses Pydantic v1 with class Config and @validator decorators
tasks.evidence_v2: [FastAPI 0.100] Requires Pydantic v2 with model_config dict and @field_validator decorators

source_change.context: Migration from Pydantic v1 to v2
